channel.title: Comments on: 2 years of working out
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description:
cool! Now you should beat up people for fun (I would have said kick some ass, but with the last comment people will get a wrong impression of you).
Does that mean that now you wear world gym shirts and work-up pants?
item.content:encoded:
cool! Now you should beat up people for fun (I would have said kick some ass, but with the last comment people will get a wrong impression of you).

Does that mean that now you wear world gym shirts and work-up pants?

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
Thank you, Shai
Hope to get together soon.
item.content:encoded:
Thank you, Shai

Hope to get together soon.

item.title: By: Shai
item.dc:creator: Shai
item.description:
I also like the way you look... When is the next time we can get together ?
:)
Keep up the good work !
item.content:encoded:
I also like the way you look…
When is the next time we can get together ?

:)

Keep up the good work !

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: Thanks a lot. I appreciate it :)

item.title: By: sveta the great
item.dc:creator: sveta the great
item.description:
Respek!
Seriously, i remember your previous '1 year working out' milestone. Way to go!
item.content:encoded:
Respek!

Seriously, i remember your previous ‘1 year working out’ milestone. Way to go!
